title: @Riot Placed in lower priority queue because of laptop failure
body: Lately my laptop has been acting up and crashes at random times last time it crashed (in game) I was like "Okay thats it Im sending this in for repairs." And I did. Almost a week later (after getting my laptop back from the repair guys) I come back to a lower priority queue. I understand your system, and I get that leaving isnt okay. But is there anything you can do about this considering the circumstances?

replies.body:
We cannot remove any LPQ's or penalties as a result of the Leaverbuster system for any reason. There are a few reasons for this, but the two biggest are that regardless of intent, disconnecting from a match negatively impacts everyone in the match and we're locked out of making these types of changes to prevent abuse of the system.

We understand that sometimes *shit hits the fan*, which is why you cannot receive a penalty for a single match. It takes a consistent trend of disconnections before you see a low-priority queue on your account. Check out our [Leaverbuster FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) for more information, and please let me know if you have any other questions.
